{"id":968141769,"question_id":2786,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1686410126,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/968141769/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Semi-Repetitive Substring","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int longestSemiRepetitiveSubstring(String s) {\n      \n        List<Integer> list = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Integer> rev = new ArrayList<>();\n        int len = s.length();\n        \n        list.add(-1);\n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i<len-1; i++){\n            \n            if(s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(i+1)){\n                list.add(i);\n                rev.add(i+1);\n                cnt++;\n            }\n                \n        }\n        \n        rev.add(len);\n        \n        int max = 2;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<list.size()-2; i++){\n              // System.out.println(list.get(i));\n            max = Math.max(max, list.get(i+2)-list.get(i));\n        }\n        //52233\n        // 0 1 3 4\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<rev.size()-2; i++){\n            // System.out.println(rev.get(i));\n            max = Math.max(max,  rev.get(i+2)-rev.get(i));\n        }\n        \n        \n        if(list.size()==1 && rev.size()==1 || cnt==1)\n            return len;\n        //111111\n        //01234\n        //225335/\n        // -1  0  3 \n        // 22335\n        // 0 , 2  4\n        \n        \n        // 001 \n         // -10 \n         //    1 3\n        \n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-semi-repetitive-substring","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
